message: Hey, did you finish the design mockups for the new client?
Almost done! Just putting the final touches on the homepage. Should have it to you by EOD.
Awesome, can't wait to see them. The client is excited.
No pressure! ðŸ˜… By the way, which color scheme do you prefer: the blue or the green accent?
Hmm, I think the green feels more fresh and modern. Let's go with that.
Great choice. I'll update it. Thanks!
No problem. Oh, and don't forget we have that team lunch tomorrow.
Wouldn't miss it! Are we still going to that new Italian place?
Yep, reservation is under the company name. 12:30 PM.
Perfect. My stomach is already looking forward to it.
Haha, mine too. Alright, back to work. Talk soon!
Sure thing. I'll send those mockups over soon.
